title: National Information Communications Technology Development Authority, Cambodia
text: The National Information Communications Technology Development Authority (NiDA) is a <a href="government%20agency">government agency</a> responsible for managing the development of the <a href="information%20technology">information technology</a> industry in <a href="Cambodia">Cambodia</a>. Among the agency's projects are the <a href="Automation">computerization</a> of government function and training of <a href="internet">internet</a> personnel.
